nwitimes.com  (WEB - en-US)

The website of the Times of Northwest Indiana, a daily newspaper that covers Munster, Indiana, the surrounding region of northwest Indiana and the Chicago area.

This website generally maintains basic standards of credibility and transparency.
Does not repeatedly publish false content
Gathers and presents information responsibly
Regularly corrects or clarifies errors
Handles the difference between news and opinion responsibly
Avoids deceptive headlines
Website discloses ownership and financing
Clearly labels advertising
Reveals who's in charge, including any possible conflicts of interest
The site provides names of content creators, along with either contact or biographical information

Ownership and Financing

The company is owned by Lee Enterprises, a publicly traded media company. Lee Enterprises operates newspapers in 20 states, including the St. Louis Post-Dispatch.

Content

NWITimes.com focuses on news in the Northwest Indiana region, including the city of Gary, Indiana. Much of the sites coverage centers on local government, crime, education, and sports.

National and international stories are provided by The Associated Press.

The site features special sections, including Inspired Living, Get Healthy, InBusiness, and Your Family. It also publishes an annual Best of the Region series.

Credibility

Articles are measured in tone and often based on first-hand reporting. Headlines accurately reflect the content of stories. The site regularly corrects errors, and has a dedicated page for corrections. Opinion articles are run separately from news content.

Transparency

Nwitimes.com lists its ownership and its business and newsroom leadership. Email addresses and telephone numbers of reporters are listed at the top of stories, and contact information is offered for the companyâ€™s entire staff, including its publisher and editors. Ads are clearly labeled.

History

The Times of Northwest Indiana was founded in 1906 as The Lake County Times. The paper changed its name to the Hammond Times in 1933, and later, in 1967, adopted its current name. Lee Enterprises purchased the paper in 2002. NWItimes.com was registered in February 2000, according to WhoIs.com.
